sentences.en: a girl in a blue dress and ankle socks
sentences.cn: 身穿蓝色连衣裙和套袜的女孩
埃米莉姨妈织补旧袜子。

sentences.en: Gee, it's good to have a look at you, old socks!
sentences.cn: 嘿, 老兄, 我很高兴见到了你.

sentences.en: He was waggling his toes in his socks.
sentences.cn: 他的脚趾在袜子里动来动去。

sentences.en: His dark socks, I could see, had a stripe on them.
sentences.cn: 我能看出他的深色袜子上有道条纹.

sentences.en: I picked up the balled socks.
sentences.cn: 我把卷成团的袜子拾掇起来。

sentences.en: I'm wearing odd socks today by the way.
sentences.cn: 顺便提一下，我今天穿的袜子不成对。

sentences.en: In the winter she wears thick socks, Wellington boots and gloves.
sentences.cn: 冬天，她穿着厚袜子和橡胶雨靴，戴着手套。

sentences.en: Look at that guy. He's got red socks.
sentences.cn: 你看那边那个家伙，他穿着双红袜子。

sentences.en: Mari refolded the darned pullover and socks.
sentences.cn: 玛丽把织补过的套头衫和袜子重新叠好。

sentences.en: My feet were like blocks of ice despite the thermal socks.
sentences.cn: 虽然穿了保暖袜子，我的双脚还是像冰块一样。

sentences.en: She fished out a pair of David's socks for her cold feet.
sentences.cn: 她找出一双戴维的袜子穿在了冰冷的脚上。

sentences.en: She knitted him 10 pairs of socks to take with him.
sentences.cn: 她给他织了10双袜子让他带走。

sentences.en: They trekked from shop to shop in search of white knee-length socks.
sentences.cn: 他们拖着步子从一家商店走到另一家，寻找齐膝的白袜子。

phrases.tran_cn: vt. 阻止…飞行；关闭…不许飞机起落

trans.tran_cn: 短袜（ sock的名词复数 ），（尤指用拳头）猛击，重击，袜套，袜子
trans.tran_en: Socks are pieces of clothing which cover your foot and ankle and are worn inside shoes
